title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Hours Worked for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Real Value-Added Output for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Nonfinancial corporations sector output is an annual-weighted (Fisher-Ideal) index. It is constructed from the gross domestic product (GDP) excluding the following outputs: general government, nonprofit institutions, paid employees of private households, and the rental value of owner-occupied dwellings. Output for nonfinancial corporations also excludes the output of unincorporated businesses and those corporations classified as offices of bank holding companies, 

 For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003041

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Real Value-Added Output for Employees
notes:
Nonfinancial corporations sector output is an annual-weighted (Fisher-Ideal) index. It is constructed from the gross domestic product (GDP) excluding the following outputs: general government, nonprofit institutions, paid employees of private households, and the rental value of owner-occupied dwellings. Output for nonfinancial corporations also excludes the output of unincorporated businesses and those corporations classified as offices of bank holding companies,

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Real Value-Added Output for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Value-Added Output for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Nonfinancial corporate output is a chain-type, current-weighted index calculated on the basis of the costs incurred and the incomes earned from production.

 For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003051

Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Compensation for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Compensation for Employees
notes:

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Compensation for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Nonlabor Payments for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Nonlabor payments are the excess of current-dollar output in an economic sector over corresponding labor compensation, and include nonlabor costs as well as corporate profits and the profit-type income of proprietors.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003081

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Nonlabor Payments for Employees
notes:
Nonlabor payments are the excess of current-dollar output in an economic sector over corresponding labor compensation, and include nonlabor costs as well as corporate profits and the profit-type income of proprietors.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003082

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Nonlabor Payments for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Productivity (Output per Hour) for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Labor productivity, or output per hour, is calculated by dividing an index of real output by an index of hours worked of all persons, including employees, proprietors, and unpaid family workers.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003091

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Productivity (Output per Hour) for Employees
notes:
Labor productivity, or output per hour, is calculated by dividing an index of real output by an index of hours worked of all persons, including employees, proprietors, and unpaid family workers.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003092

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Labor Productivity (Output per Hour) for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Hourly Compensation for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Indexes of compensation per hour for major sectors measure the compensation of employees and the self-employed divided by hours worked by all persons engaged in the sector. Hours of all persons include hours worked by employees, proprietors, and unpaid family workers.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003101

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Hourly Compensation for Employees
notes:
Indexes of compensation per hour for major sectors measure the compensation of employees and the self-employed divided by hours worked by all persons engaged in the sector. Hours of all persons include hours worked by employees, proprietors, and unpaid family workers.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003102

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Hourly Compensation for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Labor Costs for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
BLS calculates unit labor costs as the ratio of hourly compensation to labor productivity.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003111

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Labor Costs for Employees
notes:
BLS calculates unit labor costs as the ratio of hourly compensation to labor productivity.

Source Indicator PRS88003112

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Labor Costs for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Costs for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Unit Nonlabor costs include, consumption of fixed capital, taxes on production and imports less subsidies, net interest and miscellaneous payments, and business current transfer payments.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003121

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Costs for Employees
notes:
Unit Nonlabor costs include, consumption of fixed capital, taxes on production and imports less subsidies, net interest and miscellaneous payments, and business current transfer payments.

Source Indicator PRS88003122

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Costs for Employees
Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Payments for Employees
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Unit nonlabor payments (UNLP) include the nonlabor components of gross product originating in a given sector-consumption of fixed capital, taxes on production and imports less subsidies, net interest and miscellaneous payments, business current transfer payments, rental income of persons, and the current surplus of government enterprises as well as profits-whereas unit nonlabor costs (UNLC) exclude profits.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003131

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Payments for Employees
notes:
Unit nonlabor payments (UNLP) include the nonlabor components of gross product originating in a given sector-consumption of fixed capital, taxes on production and imports less subsidies, net interest and miscellaneous payments, business current transfer payments, rental income of persons, and the current surplus of government enterprises as well as profits-whereas unit nonlabor costs (UNLC) exclude profits.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS88003132

title: Nonfinancial Corporations Sector: Unit Nonlabor Payments for Employees
